Life Story

The second son of Akitt’s mother’s brother, Lynd has always worked hard and led an active outdoor life. He is extremely fit, looking somewhat younger than his 34 years. His blue eyes are a striking contrast to his jet black hair and make him stand out in a crowd. He is cocky and proud of his body, wearing tight leather pants and a leather jerkin which emphasize his physique. Lynd is a darling with the ladies. Although intelligent, he talks quite slowly, appearing to pause and carefully consider every word. Lynd is definitely more capable than his cousin, but fate granted the manor to Akitt. Lynd stays for the easy money.
